review: Visited the hospital as I had a health issue. *** ********* *** ***** I was not able to follow up due to lockdown. I need to take some tests and visit hospital again. I had to visit mid-march but due to the current situation, I need to visit again later once the issues resolve. Medicines were prescribed. I had issue related to Insulin and the hormonal level was high. Waiting time was there and visited twice there. I am satisfied with the treatment given. The hospital need to manage time as there is a long waiting time and I am a working woman, it is a waste of time for me if I had to wait for so long. I can recommend the doctor to my family or friends.

My wife had a gynecological related issue, so we had visited the hospital. ****** *** ***** Doctor prescribed tablets. Blood test was done. Waiting time was not much. I am satisfied with the treatment given. We were able to see improvements later. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Experience with the doctor was good . First of all Practo assures less waiting time and second is that I already had arranged an appointment of 6 pm . But I was made to wait for 2 and a half hours, with my condition . I was visiting from a place that is atleast 45 mins away . This has caused me inconvenience . Hence, I would happily recommend the doctor but not the hospital or Practo .
The doctor's behaviour was good. I consulted related to UTI. I am satisfied with doctor treatment and I would like to recommend this doctor to others. I will give 5/5 stars to the doctor.

I visited for my wife as she was having fever and was satisfied with the doctor's treatment. Staff, maintenance and everything was good in the hospital. I would like to recommend this doctor to others and I will give a rating to this doctor on 9/10.
she is such a wonderful lady! and a very experienced doctor. her diagnosis were brief and on point! i can completely recommend her to everybody!

I was laparoscopically treated for fimbrial and ovarian cysts, and also underwent adhesiolysis. (These issues were discovered during a routine health checkup). The doctor was very professional, and I felt well taken care of throughout. I appreciate it very much that she came on a Sunday to check on me post surgery. I definitely recommend the doctor.
* **** **** ******* speaks very nicely and understands the patient,If there is any problem in gynecology, let him know once and hopefully your problem will be fixed
She was very warm and made me feel very comfortable. Her medicines also worked. Recommending her for sure.
